H0.text: Who was Pope during World War Two. Pope Pius XI

H1.text: Who was Pope during World War Two. Pope John XXIII

H2.text: Who was Pope during World War Two. Pope Paul VI

H3.text: Who was Pope during World War Two. PPXII

A4.text: Pope Pius XII was head of the Catholic Church and sovereign of the Vatican City from 2 March 1939 until his death on 9 October 1958.
